description: ArcAds.AI is an AI-powered video advertising platform that enables marketers to rapidly generate, localize, and test UGC-style video ads using hyper-realistic AI avatars, reducing production cost and increasing creative velocity. This project must be built as a Laravel package located at C:\laragon\www\MixpostApp\packages\video-gen and is entirely backend-driven with no UI required at this stage. All application state, internal Laravel functions, database access, environment variables, and convenience tests should be handled through the Tinker debug library (C:\laragon\www\MixpostApp\packages\tinker-debug\README.md) for ad-hoc code execution and debugging. All env variables are already set in the main app .env file and are available inside the application As well as somewhere to store the profile or page ID in which to post to.

userStories.description: As a performance marketer, I want to choose from a large library of realistic AI avatars so that my ads feel authentic and relatable to different audiences.
acceptanceCriteria: System provides access to 50+ AI avatars generated by google api (nano banana) (use GOOGLE_API_KEY env variable, use C:\laragon\www\MixpostApp\app\Services\ImageGeneration\Providers\GoogleImagesProvider.php as an example)
Avatars represent diverse demographics
Avatars display natural facial expressions and body language

userStories.description: As a marketer, I want to convert a written script into a video ad using an AI avatar so that I can produce ads quickly without filming.
acceptanceCriteria: User can input text scripts
System supports at least 35 languages
Text-to-speech is generated automatically using openai api using these env variables (OPENAI_ORG_ID, GOOGLE_API_KEY)
Video is generated in 15 minutes or less
Output video is delivered in MP4 format
video length must be 5 seconds
Video was generated using replicate.com wan-video/wan-2.6-i2v (use REPLICATE_API_KEY variable)
video generation must support other models from replicate.com e.g. wan-video/wan-2.5-i2v

userStories.description: As a user, I want to upload my own voice audio so that the avatar speaks using my preferred tone and cadence.
acceptanceCriteria: User can upload a voice audio file
Original voice tone and cadence are preserved
Voice style can be changed using ELEVEN_LABS_API api us ELEVEN_LABS_API_KEY env variable.

userStories.description: As a professional user, I want to create a custom AI avatar from my own footage so that my brand uses a proprietary spokesperson.
acceptanceCriteria: User can upload and manage training footage or images
Custom avatar is accessible only to the owning account
Avatar quality matches or exceeds library avatars

userStories.description: As a marketer, I want to generate multiple video variants in bulk so that I can rapidly A/B test hooks, avatars, and scripts.
acceptanceCriteria: User can input multiple scripts
User can select multiple avatars
Videos are generated in parallel
Batch download of generated videos is available

userStories.description: As a marketer, I want to use pre-built UGC-style video templates so that my ads match native social media formats.
acceptanceCriteria: System offers talking-head testimonial templates
Templates use casual and organic framing
Videos can be generated in 9:16, 1:1, and 16:9 formats

userStories.description: As a marketer, I want AI assistance for writing ad scripts and hooks so that I can generate high-performing creatives faster.
acceptanceCriteria: System generates multiple hook variations which are generated using an llm using the openrouter api
Supports common ad frameworks
Generated scripts are editable by the user

userStories.description: As a paid user, I want to download my generated videos in high quality so that I can use them in external tools and ad platforms.
acceptanceCriteria: Videos are downloadable in MP4 format
Video resolution is at least 720p

userStories.description: As an enterprise user, I want API access to generate videos programmatically so that I can integrate ArcAds into my internal systems.
acceptanceCriteria: API supports video generation requests
API supports lip-sync functionality
Authentication and rate limiting are enforced
API access is restricted to Pro or Enterprise plans

userStories.description: As a marketer, I want to remix and animate existing videos so that I can transform raw footage into stylized ad content.
acceptanceCriteria: User can upload existing video files
System supports common video formats (MP4, MOV, etc.)
Video is remixed using replicate.com wan-video/wan-2.2-animate-animation (use REPLICATE_API_KEY variable)
Remixed video maintains original duration
User can preview remixed output before finalizing
Remixed videos are downloadable in MP4 format

userStories.description: As a marketer, I want to generate custom AI avatars from text prompts so that I can create unique spokespersons tailored to my campaign needs.
acceptanceCriteria: User can input text descriptions for avatar appearance
Avatar images are generated using Google API (nano banana model)
Generated avatars can be saved to user's avatar library
User can regenerate with modified prompts
Generated avatars are compatible with video generation workflow
Multiple avatar variations can be generated from a single prompt
